contentrichtext.text: The '''Citizens Party''' is the name of: *The [[Citizens Party (Hong Kong)]] *The [[Citizens' Party (Iceland)]] *The [[Citizen's Party (Singapore)]] *The [[Citizen's Party (Thailand)]] *The [[Citizens' Party (Catalonia)]] *'''Citizens Party''', a short-lived party label used in 1888 by Milwaukee Republicans and Democrats to prevent the election of Union Labor candidate Herman Kroeger as Mayor of Milwaukee by uniting behind former Mayor [[Thomas H. Brown]]<ref>Wells, Robert W. ''This Is Milwaukee'' New York: Doubleday, 1970; p. 169</ref> *The [[Citizens Party (United States)]], a short lived political party organized by Barry Commoner in 1980. *The [[Citizens Party of the United States]], founded in 2010. *The [[Nationalist Citizens' Party]] of the Philippines *The [[White Citizens Parties]], local Jim Crow era parties in the Southern United States == References == {{reflist}} {{disambiguation|political}}
